_header: All our weal and all our life
_description: Christ’s Wounds as Remedies for the Deadly Sins — seven quatrains with Latin couplets before and between in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Al oure wele & al oure lifsum time þoru pride was for
                    lore…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…but remedie þer to þu hastOf crist þat drank
                    þe bitter galle
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 56-7.
